Message.Msg: He's calculating the jobs created based on the number of people who's unemployment benefits are running out times a constant then dividing by the number of prison guards needed to keep an eye on the ones that are caught committing crimes to feed their families. The constant itself is no doubt a deeply hidden White House economic secret, not to be disclosed to the public, along with his entire "jobs" plan.

Topic.Title: For 4 whole years Obama has solved exactly nothing

Message.Msg: Majority of Americans (mostly Obama voters) don't know what budget deficit is.If you exclude those from total who voted in 2012, Mitt Romney would be President with very large margin. Expect similar result when you ask a hard question: who is the speaker of the House. Yeah. Someone who has no idea how/where to get an ID card has a right to vote too. And G-d forbid to ask ID in the voting booth. That's what gave Obama 3.5M extra votes to win, That's who Obama wants to be right where they are, in darkness. Thank you.

The sad truth is the majority of the American voters either new this baffoon resided over a failing economy or just don't give a hoot, and re-elected him anyway. I guess if you are on welfare, food stamps, HUD, unemployment for two years, etc. who needs a dumb job...and the kicker is you can call all these government agency and ask for more with your newly aquired Obamaphone...life is good!

What they will say is the Jerry(moonbeam)Brown raised taxes on everyone to cover the teacher pension liabilities, and lied about how much California was in need of tax increases. Short term fix to a long term trend of folks with means moving out and millions of poor people moving in. All that will be left is poor Mexicans, pensioners, and everybody to stupid to "get it" in the middle will be paying for it all. I had no idea thet you resided in California, if not you should come on out and join in all the fun. Northeast liberals are welcome too!

Message.Title: Draghi vs. Bernanke
Message.Msg: If you notice the European Central Bank only talks about lower rates, but doesn't lower them, while Bernanke keeps trashing the dollar to keep the S&P up. With 47million people and one out of four children on food stamps in the US...I would say is that his policies are only helping the folks with capital to invest... He is a banker after all. BTW, have you noticed gas prices as of late at the pump...another consequence of his dollar policy. The dollar dropped Thursday, pushing the euro up by the most since September, after comments from European Central Bank President Mario Draghi lowered expectations that an interest-rate cut will be coming soon. “He sounded rather upbeat on the economic outlook,” said David Song, an analyst at DailyFX. “Market participants took it as a signal that the ECB would hold off on any additional rate cuts for the time being.” The ICE dollar index /quotes/zigman/1652083 DXY -1.01% , which measures the greenback against a basket of six major currencies, fell to 79.678 from 80.514 late Wednesday.
